channel.title: C.K Meena on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in C.K Meena on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: 'When names don’t matter' by C.K. Meena
item.description: _C.K. Meena is a columnist in The Hindu, one of India´s biggest news papers. She was my teacher when I took up a certificate course in Journalism and we soon became friends.

item.title: 'Caste in a different mould' by C.K. Meena
item.description: _C.K. Meena is a columnist in The Hindu, one of India´s biggest news papers. She was my teacher when I took up a certificate course in Journalism and we soon became friends.
